name: Company of Heroes 2: OKW Commander - Elite Armor Doctrine
summary: OKW Commander - Elite Armor Doctrine; Use superior equipment and experienced crewmen to augment your armored forces. Plan your tactics with Signal Relay or recover your armor with an Emergency Repair. Use the Sturmtiger to spearhead the assault. Signal Relay: Boosting signal range briefly reveals enemy vehicles on the mini-map.
